EmailTemplate.name: ChangetaskOwnerApproval_capa
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Request for Owner Change of {!01I61000000v12Z.RecordType}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You have been assigned as an approver for changing the task owner of the {!01I61000000v12Z.RecordType} of CAPA record {!01I61000000udkO.Name}.
The new owner of the task is {!01I61000000v12Z.00N6100000DVGbg}.
Please log in to the Qualityze application and complete the approval process.
Please contact {!01I61000000udkO.OwnerFullName} if you have any questions about this assignment and/or non-conformance record.
Thank you.
Click here for details{!01I61000000udkO.RecordType}
